description: USA Today Reviewed.com named the Crossfade LP2…"2012 headphones of the year"The new industry standardin precision audio and rock-solid engineering…Why LP2?Superior SoundUnrivaled DurabilityComfort, Customization, StylePortabilityDetachable Microphone & Audio CablesSuperior Sound"The only headphones I’ve seen that look  good and still have amazing sound. They’re the perfect mixture of style, quality, and performance. I use them both onstage and off, when I’m watching movies."-AVICIIImmersive 3D Soundstage…  evokes the experience of a live performanceRefined Vibrant Bass… don't just hear the music, feel it in absolute BLISS from the outside worldVivacious Highs & Vivid Midrange…  hear lifelike vocals,  clear cymbals and crispy hi-hats
title: V-MODA Crossfade LP2 Limited Edition Over-Ear Noise-Isolating Metal Headphone (Matte Black) (OLD MODEL)
